update.description:
Added the options `Transparent` and `Wireframe` to the object menu. 

For desktop they are on the context menu, and for touch they are on the radial menu.

Made some icons for the radial menu, but they can certainly be improved.

Screenshots: https://www.dropbox.com/s/0h31yk4z1r2ksxj/trans_wire.png
update.title: View Transparent and View Wireframe options to object menu

content.html:
let's try avoid using while (true) loops

  while (parent && parent !== this.scene)
  {
    if (parent.name.indexOf(name) !== -1)
    {
      return parent;
    }

    parent = parent.parent;
  }
  return null;

content.raw:
I noticed a problem when switching between wireframe/transparent modes and also View->Collisions. 

to reproduce: 

1. Insert dumpster

2. right click on dumpster and view as wireframe

3. From menu, View Collisions

4. Uncheck wireframe mode.

The dumpster model now has as solid orange color for its collisions
content.html:
I noticed a problem when switching between wireframe/transparent modes and also View->Collisions.

to reproduce:

  1. Insert dumpster

  2. right click on dumpster and view as wireframe

  3. From menu, View Collisions

  4. Uncheck wireframe mode.

The dumpster model now has as solid orange color for its collisions

pullrequest.title: View Transparent and View Wireframe options to object menu

content.raw:
cool! One thing I noticed is that on desktop it is clear that the wireframe and transparent modes can be active at the same time since there are check boxes to indicate this. But on a mobile device, I forgot about it and was trying a few times to switch from wireframe to transparent mode without noticing any change. 

I can think of two ways to resolve this. 

1) Make wireframe/transparent menu highlighted on mobile devices to indicate the mode is enabled,

2) make them exclusive so only one mode can be on at once.
content.html:
cool! One thing I noticed is that on desktop it is clear that the wireframe and transparent modes can be active at the same time since there are check boxes to indicate this. But on a mobile device, I forgot about it and was trying a few times to switch from wireframe to transparent mode without noticing any change.

I can think of two ways to resolve this.

1) Make wireframe/transparent menu highlighted on mobile devices to indicate the mode is enabled,

2) make them exclusive so only one mode can be on at once.
